text: Vladimir Valentinovich Menshov (; 17 September 1939 – 5 July 2021)Умер Владимир Меньшов. Tass.ru. 5 July 2021 was a Soviet and Russian actor and film director. He was known for directing the 1979 melodrama Moscow Does Not Believe in Tears, which won the Academy Award for Best Foreign Language Film. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Russian movie actors Category:Russian stage actors Category:Russian movie directors Category:Russian movie producers Category:Russian screenwriters Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Moscow
title: Vladimir Menshov
